Articles.Content:
For those who don't know I am one of the larger live streamers on twitch for KSP, and as many of you know

Damion has left the KSP team recently. Damion did a hell of alot of work getting the KSP community to where it

is today and has helped me and the other main streamers out a ton, by promoting the stream on the KSP facebook

and twitter, and by showing up and talking with us on stream. He also brought C7 onto my kerbalpalooza stream

for a Q & A with some of the other streamers.

Because of all this I did a stream where I took Damion and the main 7 streamers of KSP around kerbin 20 times,

and then sent off Damion in style, out of the Solar System in an SSTO. So here is the fully edited video.

Thank you so much Damion from the KSP community.
